definitions.definition: A ship that has sunk or run aground so that it is no longer seaworthy ; a ruined vessel or its remains .
An event where a ship sinks or runs aground.
Destruction ; disaster ; failure ; ruin ; irretrievable loss .

main_definition: A ship that has sunk or run aground so that it is no longer seaworthy ; a ruined vessel or its remains .
secondary_definitions: ( countable , uncountable ) An event where a ship sinks or runs aground.
( figurative ) Destruction ; disaster ; failure ; ruin ; irretrievable loss .
